main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in Dayton, Ohio from December 1950 to December 1963, including observations of a bright object that changed course and disappeared.
interesting points: The sightings included a bright star-like object that would circle and disappear and reappear,The first reported sighting occurred on December 15, 1960, with two students as witnesses,The object appeared bright at 60-70Â° in the southeast sky,Multiple sightings reported in the same location (Dayton, Ohio) over the span of several years,There were episodes of objects being tracked by ground radar as well as visual observations.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects, described as a ball of fire and a bright, star-like object
witness description: Students who observed the object on December 15, 1960, but originally made no report until later
